name: Heartery
description:
Everyone knows that a body needs oxygen to survive. In Heartery you control the process in which blood delivers oxygen to the different limbs of the body.

Initially created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2013. The theme was the sound of a heart beat. We received an award for "Most Polished" at the SPSU jam site.

Instructions



Change the directions of the heart valves by clicking and dragging to guide blood cells to limbs in need of oxygen. Be careful not to make blood cells bump into each other, causing blood clots.


Credits
Vu Ha - Code
Rose Peng - Art
Annick Huber - Art
Andres Villarreal - Audio
